Optimus Fury is from the future. I've even worked out a line of 
Optimuses after Primal since we don't know what happened to him so far 
as I know. Optimus Primitive, Optimus Fur, Optimus Fir (don't ask me 
how to verbaly distinguish), and Optimus Fury the apprentise of 
Optimus Fir who someday will lead the Malacons to glory (I hope. By 
the way is anyone interested in a Malacon Char and could you bring 
back the Anglions remember they're clueless about the Malacons).
